name: SQUARE² (Fafale)
description:
Square² (Square squared) is a game inspired by Ultimate Chicken Horse that allows up to 10 players  to play simultaneously with LAN-based multiplayer.

CURRENTLY DON'T HAVE A POINT LIMIT, SO IT'LL CONTINUE INDEFINITELY!

Currently in beta, feel free to send console errors, if any.

The game's still in beta/early development, and at the moment is a 'cheap copy' of UCH as I'm currently trying to get the core of the game working.

I pretend to add more features in the future to make it a unique game (and not just a copy)!
